text: Armando Nieto Vélez (October 24, 1931 - March 27, 2017) was a jesuit priest and Peruvian historian. He was born in Lima, Peru. Nieto was professor of the Pontifical Catholic University of Peru. He was ordained a priest by the Society of Jesus, in Frankfurt am Main Cathedral, on August 28, 1964.Enciclopedia católica: Armando Nieto Vélez S.J. He was also the Director of the Peruvian Center of Studies Historic-Militar, Director of Riva Agüero Institute and President of National Academy of History. Nieto died on March 27, 2017 in Lima from pneumonia, aged 85. ==Related pages== *List of historians by continent ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Historians Category:Jesuits Category:Peruvian Roman Catholic priests Category:Writers from Lima
